Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Interestingly , the presence of a breast cancer case < 36 years of age was strongly predictive of the presence of any of the eight mutations screened .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| breast cancer |

Explanation:

The word or phrase that represents a disease in the paragraph is "breast cancer". It is a condition where cells in the breast begin to grow out of control, which can lead to the formation of a tumor. In this case, the paragraph mentions the presence of a breast cancer case in an individual under 36 years of age, which is used as a predictor for the presence of certain mutations.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| breast cancer |

Explanation:

The only word or phrase that clearly refers to a disease in the paragraph is "breast cancer". The other terms mentioned in the paragraph, such as "36 years of age" and "the eight mutations screened", do not refer to diseases. Therefore, the valid entity is "breast cancer", which is presented in the table above.
